articles.title: From Concussion to Alzheimer's: Mini-Brain Unlocks Time-Sensitive Link - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers developed a "traumatic brain injury (TBI) on a chip" to explore the links between concussions and Alzheimer's disease.
articles.content:
